contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 1, 2015 D Brass At The Guild (Preston) Contest (First Section)
Brass At The Guild (Preston) Contest (First Section) 5 Own Choice from a Specified List Brass at the Guild (Preston) brass-at-the-guild-preston-contest-first-section
Own Choice from a Specified List
A London Overture
Guild Hall, Preston, Lancashire, England, UK Choice of test piece: "A London Overture", Philip Sparke, or "Three English Folk Songs" All 5 bands chose to play London Overture. First Prize - The Carol Baker Trophy + £400
Second Prize –The Poulton W.J. Taylor Trophy + £200
Third Prize - The R. Rigby Trophy + £150
The Dorothy Southern Trophy to the Best Soloist (Solo cornet Poulton)
The Stan Cook Trophy to the Best Soprano (Longridge)
The Bill Singleton Trophy to the Best Basses (Lindley)
The Tony Brown Trophy to the Winning MD (David Holland, Haslingden and Helmshore)
Aug. 24, 2014, 4:06 p.m. Feb. 2, 2015, 10:17 a.m.
1 Haslingden & Helmshore Band David Holland A London Overture
2 Longridge Band Mark Peacock A London Overture
3 Poulton-Le-Fylde Band Dave Collins A London Overture
4 Hade Edge Jonathan Beatty A London Overture
5 Lindley Band Jessica Tredrea A London Overture
